unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We've had good success with IIT Delhi grads in the past. Looking forward to visiting BITS Pilani on 26/07/2024. Need to finalize the stipend - targeting around Rs. 4,50,000. The pre-placement talk is scheduled for 14:00 hrs on 27/07/2024, followed by interviews on 28/07/2024 at 09:30 hrs. Jai Hind! Hoping to onboard freshers by 15/08/2024.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for talent acquisition. We've had good success with I I T Delhi grads in the past. Looking forward to visiting B I T S Pilani on twenty sixth July two thousand and twenty four. Need to finalize the stipend - targeting around rupee four hundred and fifty thousand. The pre-placement talk is scheduled for fourteen hundred hours on twenty seventh July two thousand and twenty four, followed by interviews on twenty eighth July two thousand and twenty four at nine thirty hours. Jai Hind! Hoping to onboard freshers by fifteenth August two thousand and twenty four.
